short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Auto refresh any website with our advanced web monitor and notifications extension

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Auto Refresh offers a wide range of features to refresh any website with tons of special and amazing features that will assist you with your daily tasks on the web. Below, we present all our features:

* Automatic refreshing with adjustable time intervals to keep your pages always up to date.
* Random interval function to simulate more natural behaviors and avoid bot detection.
* Visual timer on the page so you have a visual control of the time remaining until the next refresh.
* Cache bypass to ensure you receive the most recent information without interference.
* Built-in countdown timer to keep track of the time remaining before each refresh.
* Monitoring of active tabs to know exactly which tabs are being refreshed.
* Custom notifications with sound and native alerts to keep you informed about important changes.
* Email notification sending to alert you about web monitor events.
* Delay time function to adjust the keyword search time after each refresh.
* Partial refresh to update only specific parts of a web page without reloading it completely.
* Click automation.

AutoRefresh Pro also offers advanced features such as hotkeys to easily start or stop refreshing and support for multiple refreshing profiles to adapt to your needs.

Download AutoRefresh Pro today and refresh any website. You won't regret it!

Do you have any questions or suggestions? We're here to help! Contact us anytime through our contact form at https://autorefresh.pro/contact.

And remember to check our legal documents for more information about our terms of use and privacy policies:

* Terms of Use: https://autorefresh.pro/legal/terms
* Privacy Policy: https://autorefresh.pro/legal/privacy

Additionally, if you have any features in mind that you'd like to see in future versions of AutoRefresh Pro, don't hesitate to request them! Visit https://autorefresh.pro/ to submit your suggestions.
Thank you for choosing AutoRefresh Pro to refresh web pages with an advanced monitoring system!

Options:
Auto Refresh
Keyword Monitor
Auto Refresh with notifications
Auto keyword
